ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 2
ComicInfo.Summary: FBI man Aldo Sax's legendary skills at piecing together the most baffling of cases has gotten him assigned to what may be his most confusing case yet. He has almost zero leads to go on, but the one hunch he does have takes him from a concert by the Ulther Cats to the mysterious courtyard in front of the home of a purported drug dealer. What follows is a whirlwind of sudden activity and unexpected twists that leads to a surprise ending that will shock you.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-08 09:40:29. [CVDB106723]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Alan Moore, Jacen Burrows, Alan Moore, Jacen Burrows
ComicInfo.Inker: Alan Moore, Jacen Burrows, Alan Moore
ComicInfo.Characters: Aldo Sax, Azathoth, Cthulhu, Nyarlathotep, Shub-Niggurath, Tsathougga, Yog-Sothoth
ComicInfo.Locations: Brooklyn, New York City, New York State, Red Hook, Brooklyn
